data.description: text processing between pinyin and zhuypin
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is for converting and verifying Mandarin pinyin and
    Taiwan zhuyin. Lingua::ZH is for chinese text processing, so it goes
    there. It is not the same as Lingua::ZH::ZhuYinWen becuase of the
    approach of hwo the conversion is done and it will have more
    functionality. It will also work with unicode, while
    Lingua::ZH::ZhuYinWen only works with big5. The module has also been
    uploaded to CPAN
